DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate participant-reported preference for either ibandronate or a comparator drug in women with postmenopausal osteoporosis. The anticipated time of study treatment is 6 months, and the target sample size is 338 individuals.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Ibandronate (Bonviva) in Patients With Post-Menopausal Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: Ambulatory women Diagnosis of postmenopausal osteoporosis Women who have never received bisphosphonate therapy, or who have discontinued daily bisphosphonates at least 3 months prior to study entry Inability to stand or sit in the upright position for greater than or equal to 60 minutes Allergy to bisphosphonates; Previous or current treatment with weekly or monthly bisphosphonates, or daily bisphosphonates for the last 3 months prior to study entry
